name: Padel Bounce
description:
Use keyboard arrows, mouse or touch screen for playing.

(May take up to one minute to load)

Go up the platforms while the ball does not stop bouncing!

Avoid the dangers that you will find along the way, such as black holes and exploding platforms.

Test your speed and skill in chrono mode where you must finish the level as quickly as possible in exciting games of less than a minute.

In the infinite mode you will have to avoid the dangers to get as high as possible. It gets more and more difficult!
